title: Dual inhibitory potential of ganoderic acid A on GLUT1/3: computational and in vitro insights into targeting glucose metabolism in human lung cancer
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28569-28584
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04454A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mona Alrasheed Bashir, Mohnad Abdalla, Chang-Sheng Shao, Han Wang, Precious Bondzie-Quaye, Waleed Abdelbagi Almahi, Mohammed Sharif Swallah, Qing Huang
Human glucose transporters (GLUTs) facilitate the uptake of hexoses into cells. In cancer, the increased proliferation necessitates higher expression of GLUTs. This study demonstrates the inhibitory function of ganoderic acid A (GAA) on GLUT1/3.
